Articles.Content:
I know this has been mentioned and discussed a bit in the dedicated rescale mod thread but I have not seen a definitive answer or heard about possible alternatives.

Are there any mods that rescale the Kerbol system compatible with 1.7.3? The only ones I know of are the Sigma Replacements mods and all of them crash my game on launch.

Sigma Replacements don't rescale the system

Sigma Dimensions rescales the system and it works fine in 1.7.3 as far as I know.

if you have problems you are welcome to open a bug report (possibly on github) 

 

follow the link in my signature for an explanation of how to make a bug report
Thank you, now that I know others are running Sigma Dimensions just fine on 1.7.3, I will try again and post any future issues in the dedicated thread.
